sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Envelops user inputs for the selected table field of given BAPI in an object.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • RFC - Reference to records (SAP RFC Name and Application Component) in SAP ECC RFC table.
  • Table Field - Name of the Table field from the selected RFC.
  • Field Name - Input fields from the selected table field, represented in a flat structure.

Outputs :

  • Response - List of objects with an object having user inputs provided for the selected table field of given BAPI.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is any failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Atleast one attribute must be selected from Input Fields.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Create Table Field Object
